DOC.brief_summary: This study design test safety aspect effect lung function new dry powder version GSK159797 asthmatic subject inhale . This allow comparison previous study use inhalation drug vapour .
DOC.brief_title: Single Doses GSK159797 On Patient Safety And Lung Function In Patients With Mild To Moderate Asthma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects mild moderate stable asthma lung problem . Male subject females able get pregnant ( e.g . postmenopausal surgically sterile ) . Nonsmokers . Subjects show measurable improvement function lung single dose salbutamol . Exclusion criterion : Any significant illness . Subjects heart problem . Subjects cold chest infection 24 week prior study . Subjects take medication asthma , condition , compatible study .
